Articles.Content:
I know i'm bumping something really old, here, but i think this is the best place to ask about this. I'm attempting to complete this contract, and, although my flight complies with every requirement (altitude window between 2500 and 20000, velocity over 343 m/s, vertical velocity under 10m/s, and holding all of those simultaneously for [well over] 5 seconds), the contract simply won't trigger to green check.

My aircraft also complies fully (no rockets or any other shenanigans), being operated by a pilot... it has wings...

Starting to doubt my own sanity, here. Any thoughts?

 

Moderator Note:    This post original came from this thread, but has been split off into it's own thread. 

Edited September 29, 2019 by Gargamel
Added Mod Note

1 hour ago, C-Hawk said:

I know i'm bumping something really old, here, but i think this is the best place to ask about this. I'm attempting to complete this contract, and, although my flight complies with every requirement (altitude window between 2500 and 20000, velocity over 343 m/s, vertical velocity under 10m/s, and holding all of those simultaneously for [well over] 5 seconds), the contract simply won't trigger to green check.

My aircraft also complies fully (no rockets or any other shenanigans), being operated by a pilot... it has wings...

Starting to doubt my own sanity, here. Any thoughts?

Well, if what you listed out is accurate, that doesn't sound like any stock contract. So you are using some sort of mod?

This old thread is probably not the best place for your question, so I think you should start a new thread about your issue, including posting a screenshot of your contract -- since it sounds unusual, or the way you are trying to complete it is very non-standard.

On 9/27/2019 at 11:45 PM, bewing said:

Well, if what you listed out is accurate, that doesn't sound like any stock contract. So you are using some sort of mod?

This old thread is probably not the best place for your question, so I think you should start a new thread about your issue, including posting a screenshot of your contract -- since it sounds unusual, or the way you are trying to complete it is very non-standard.

 

It is from a contract pack mod, yes. I'm sorry, i'm obviously new to the forum, is that not an acceptable area of discussion?

OP created the mod ("Giving Aircraft a Purpose") into which this precise contract went.

35 minutes ago, C-Hawk said:

. I'm sorry, i'm obviously new to the forum, is that not an acceptable area of discussion?

While the OP did make the contract pack you are using, they question they asked is not related to your problem at all.   Posting in this thread will only lead to confusion.   The best thing to do is ask in the Mod thread you are using, and if you don't get a clear answer there, then after a few days, start a new tech support thread. 

 

Ya know what.... I'll just go ahead and do that for you.   I'm splitting this off into it's own thread, maybe you can get some help that way.

On 9/29/2019 at 6:00 PM, Gargamel said:

Ya know what.... I'll just go ahead and do that for you.   I'm splitting this off into it's own thread, maybe you can get some help that way. 

Thanks, u da real MVP.
